title: Ghost Behind Me
description: When her family first moved into the empty old house, Cinnamon sensed something wasn't quite right. Then she found a packet of old love letters, and the eerie sensation grew stronger. They were letters from Felix to Emily - beautiful, romantic letters filled with the forbidden yearnings of the love they shared long ago.Now Felix's ghost wants Cinnamon's help finding his long-lost Emily. He follows her everywhere, pleading, begging, insisting that she help him. Can she resist his strange power? Or will Cinnamon become the next victim of the mysterious ghost with the haunting dark eyes?
author: Eve Bunting
